name: Mitigation Playbook for Phishing and Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker gained access to the network through a phishing email, leading to the execution of a malicious PowerShell script.

action--c1f6c1ab-143e-4fbf-960c-7c406d18.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--c1f6c1ab-143e-4fbf-960c-7c406d18.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes related to the attack.

action--b907e9ea-7399-4e84-bd60-213bd9b5.name: Remove suspicious files downloaded by script
action--b907e9ea-7399-4e84-bd60-213bd9b5.description: Delete any malicious files that were downloaded during the attack.

while-condition--f86e6884-9784-4e6a-a94c.name: Scan loop until clean
while-condition--f86e6884-9784-4e6a-a94c.description: Continuously scan the host until no additional threats are found.

action--f86e6884-9784-4e6a-a94c-319d35fb.name: Run security scan
action--f86e6884-9784-4e6a-a94c-319d35fb.description: Perform a security scan to detect additional threats on the host.
